recommendations: “After writing my business plan and financial model I was introduced to Privity a company run by Sleem Hasan. My initial meeting with Sleem was more about me as a individual rather than my business idea. Sleem is someone who wants to know the person behind the idea before performing a due diligence on the opportunity itself. The reason why I mentioned the person behind the idea and then the opportunity is down to one fact and that is Sleem will back you 1000% and he will work day and night to open doors leading to investment and business engagements. Privity is a well established and connected organization in Dubai with a 20 year track record with connections leading to the very top which my company has benefitted from. Sleem is connected to a well established Oxford & Cambridge Alumni network which branches across the UAE and it has been an absolute privilege to meet this network where the individuals I have been talking to ends with PHD. Working with Sleem a person with a mathematical mind and tutored by legendary Professor Steven Hawkings makes me feel so privileged to have connected with Sleem who I can call my brother. My journey with Sleem does not end here as I will be using Privity for ongoing strategic advisory ! Thank you Sleem for turning my dream into a reality and helping me to disrupt the Datacentre market across the UAE.” Show less

“It is with great pleasure and admiration that I recommend Sleem Hasan and his esteemed company, Privity FZ LLE, for any collaborative endeavors. I have had the privilege of partnering with Sleem and his team on our recent project, "Between Heaven & Earth," a humanitarian initiative uniting Art & Philanthropy to support children and families affected by ultra-rare genetic diseases worldwide, while also enriching the cultural fabric of each community we touch. Sleem serves as our Partner Relations Director in the UAE, and from the outset, his warmth and support have been remarkable. He seamlessly facilitated connections with a diverse array of professionals, sponsors, and organizations globally, all dedicated to advancing our shared mission. Sleem's professionalism is exemplary—he is dependable, efficient, and consistently goes above and beyond to ensure the success of every endeavor. Beyond his professional prowess, Sleem's genuine mentorship and insightful guidance have been invaluable assets to our project. His unwavering commitment to excellence and his ability to generate innovative ideas have been instrumental in driving our collective efforts forward. In addition to his professional acumen, Sleem's personal character is truly exceptional. Working with him is not only an honor but a joy, and his friendship is a cherished privilege. I wholeheartedly endorse Sleem Hasan and Privity FZ LLE, confident that any collaboration with them will be marked by integrity, excellence, and profound impact.” Show less
